p: Considering the data collection time, the Northern provinces (Nampula, Cabo Delgado, Niassa and Tete), Zambezia and Maputo and Maputo city had the highest number of NTDs idenified along the study span. For the last 10 years, Gaza, Manica and Inhambane are the provinces with less NTDs reported. During this period, viral NTDs have been observed in the north of the country and Maputo province, helminth’s NTDs in the northern provinces, bacterial NTDs in all of them while protozoan NTDs were not reported. Figure 3 illustrates the reported distribution of NTDs per province in Mozambique during the last 10 years. The information shown in the map is limited by the few publications available per disease.
